content: How can I search "all patients who are more than 25 years old AND have at least one Observation with XXX code"?

That's easy - however, we do urge you to try some things before asking on this forum (see https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/FHIR+Rules+for+Asking+Questions). Have you read http://build.fhir.org/search.html ?
